name: Flushed (WildGoblin)
description:
CONTROLS

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Interact: Spacebar

Puzzle your way through increasing difficulty to find your final resting place after being flushed. This cute hand-drawn puzzler will lead you through 10 different levels. All completable in under 10 minutes for a fast and enjoyable game!

CREDITS

GAME DESIGN: Destiny Barker

PROGRAMMING : Evan Barker (Wild Goblin)

ART: Courtney Skelcher (SpunkyFishWizard)

ANIMATION: Evan Barker (Wild Goblin)

MUSIC Game:  James Farrell

MUSIC Ending: Enes DENİZ

SOURCE: https://github.com/wildgoblin/Flushed
